Name: TOGUM
About the game: -- EPISODE 0: UNTIL DAWN -- TOGUM is a brazilian sci-fi indie game based on the events of the famous investigation called 'Operação Prato' ( Operation Saucer ). Play as Priscilla Wu , a funny and extrovert young girl who lives in the neighborhood of the City of Vitória called Jerusalem with her mother Erika . She was enjoying the holiday eve at her house, however, her friend Sayonara discovered a series of codes and hidden messages inside an abandoned house. Do these codes have anything to do with the so talked about 'secret meeting' that many believe takes place in her neighborhood? And could this be related to the strange lights that have appeared in the middle of the sea?
Meta Title: TOGUM: Feb 22, 2021, Dieggo Masamune and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on TOGUM? Check out the release date (Feb 22, 2021), developer insights from Dieggo Masamune, and a complete game summary.
